document.full_text: the memphis grizzlies sealed a stunning upset of top-ranked san antonio in the first round of the nba playoffs on friday, beating the spurs 99-91 to clinch their series 4-2 at the fedex forum on friday.
document.title: grizzlies seal stunning upset by eliminating spurs
lines_and_colors: the memphis grizzlies sealed a stunning upset of top-ranked san antonio in the first round of the nba playoffs on friday, beating the spurs 99-91 to clinch their series 4-2 at the fedex forum on friday.
